pr_title: Handle Kafka Schema Registry unsupported formats

timeline.message:
Cleanup in ConfluentSchemaRegistryTableDescriptionSupplier

Order fields, constructor parameters and initialization statements
so they are in the same order.
Also cleanup requireNonNull usage.
Use Optional.isEmpty() instead of negated isPresent()
Extract SchemaParser in Kafka Schema Registry
Fail fast Kafka Schema Registry on unsupported format
Fail fast Kafka Schema Registry on unsupported format

timeline.author: skrzypo987
